COST.TARGET_DEFINITION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:AddSubType( CREATURE_TYPE_VAMPIRE ) filter:SetPlayer( EffectController() ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:SetHint( HINT_ENEMY, EffectController() ) filter:AddExtra( FILTER_EXTRA_CREATURE_UNTAPPED ) filter:NotTargetted()
COST.PLAY_TIME_ACTION: EffectController():SetTargetCount( 5 ) for i = 0,4 do EffectController():SetTargetPrompt( i, "CARD_QUERY_TAP_AN_UNTAPPED_VAMPIRE_YOU_CONTROL") end EffectController():ChooseTargets( 6, EffectDC():Make_Targets(0) )
COST.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local target_array = {} for i=0,4 do target_array[i] = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_NthCardPtr(i) end for i=0,4 do if target_array[i] ~= nil then target_array[i]:Tap() end end

ACTIVATED_ABILITY.TARGET_DEFINITION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:SetHint( HINT_ENEMY, EffectController() )
ACTIVATED_ABILITY.CONTINUOUS_ACTION: local target = EffectDC():Get_Targets(1):Get_CardPtr(0) if target ~= nil then target:SetController( EffectController() ) end
local target = EffectDC():Get_Targets(1):Get_CardPtr(0) if target ~= nil then target:GetCurrentCharacteristics():SubType_GetWritable(target):Add( CREATURE_TYPE_VAMPIRE, target ) end
